{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA9400 |revision=v1 |fcc_date=06/07/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA9500V11 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG, UT1533 P10, 529177-17 Z1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58BVG0S3HTA00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1550 P30, 559632-01 3; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1550 P30, 559632-01 3; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1550 P30, 559632-01 3; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50212E;BROADCOM(R), B50212E, B1KMLG, TD1528 P21, 521108 1 W;1; |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG, TE1528 P30, 522585-10 3B W; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;PLX, Technology (R), PEX8603-AB50NI G, 1519, D44A-3B48-3010, TAIWAN;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• 2x '''2167Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., NitroQAM), :• 1x '''600Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''5000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC5000 Tri-Band MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9400/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA9400|pid=01t34000003XEgrAAG}} *Web GUI: http://LinksysSmartWiFi.com FCC filings cover both the [[Linksys EA9500 v1.1]] and this [[Linksys EA9400 v1]]. They also include two EUTs where EUT1 uses "BCM4366C0" and EUT2 uses :"BCM4366B1" and "The difference is the allocation of the antenna cables". Different RAM/Flash may also be used.
